      • isClientExist

        public boolean isClientExist​(java.lang.String accNum)
        this method is implemented to know if a we have a client with the following accNum or not
        Parameters:
        accNum - client account number
        Returns:
        boolean value true if this we found this client, false otherwise

      • addClient

        public void addClient​(Client client)
        this method responsible for adding the client to our clients array, his account to accounts array and the account number to the reserved accounts number set
        Parameters:
        client - new client of the bank

      • getClient

        public Client getClient​(java.lang.String accNum)
        this method get corresponding client of the bank given his accNum
        Parameters:
        accNum - account number of the desired client
        Returns:
        client that has an account with the given accNum

      • displayAccounts

        public void displayClients()
        this method iterate over all clients of a bank to print them

      • isUniqueAccNumber

        public boolean isUniqueAccNumber​(java.lang.String accNum)
        this method checks if there is any account have been created with the given accNum
        Parameters:
        accNum - account number of a new or existing client
        Returns:
        true if accNum is unique, false otherwise

      • transferMoney

        public boolean transferMoney​(java.lang.String from,
                             java.lang.String to,
                             double amount)
        this method is responsible for transferring money between clients of the same bank
        Parameters:
        from - account number of the client who want to transfer money
        to - account number of the client who will receive the money
        amount - amount of money to be transferred
        Returns:
        true if the transfer has done successfully
